verse: यो वै भूमा तत्सुखं नाल्पे सुखमस्ति भूमैव सुखं भूमा त्वेव विजिज्ञासितव्य इति भूमानं भगवो विजिज्ञास इति॥
meaning-gpt: Meaning:The one who seeks happiness only in this world, has only limited happiness. Indeed, happiness is found only in this world itself. Therefore, O Lord, let us seek to know the nature of this world.
